GSD.description:
ext4: fix use-after-free in ext4_rename_dir_prepare

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit eaecf7ebfd5dd09038a80b14be46b844f54cfc5c. For more details please see the references link.
